A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A daring attempt to bring lots of new and exciting views into the starwars universe: the indifference to good evil and humanity of the military industrial complex\, the role and difficulties of women in leadership\, how sometimes problems are bigger and can't be solved by the actions of a few chosen heroes\, and more. Unfortunately they were only able to accomplish them by dumbing down characters and washing out motivations and arcs\, causing the story and the messages they wanted to convey to suffer greatly. Beautiful visuals display the budget\, but overall not worth a watch.
